= Introduction =

How To Install TurboCare on Windows


= Details =

= Install MySQL =

1. Go to http://www.mysql.org/
2. Download the latest version of MySQL version 5.0 or 5.1
3. Install MySQL Server as a service

= Install Python =

1. Go to http://www.python.org/
2. Download the latest version of Python version 2.4 (NOTE: version 2.5 is too new, it hasn't been tested)
3. Install Python in the default folder
